name: Ext_R5_Subscription_contentType
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Subscription.contentType for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Subscription.contentType from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Subscription|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: MIME type to send, or omit for no payload
element.definition:
The MIME type to send the payload in - e.g., `application/fhir+xml` or `application/fhir+json`. Note that:

* clients may request notifications in a specific FHIR version by using the [FHIR Version Parameter](https://hl7.org/fhir/http.html#version-.html#version-parameter) - e.g., `application/fhir+json; fhirVersion=4.0`.

* additional MIME types can be allowed by channels - e.g., `text/plain` and `text/html` are defined by the Email channel.
element.comment: `Subscription.contentType` has no related element in R4B:Subscription
